h1.a: Ravens look to remain NFL's top closers on Jeremy Maclin's visit

div.p: After convincing Steve Smith and Mike Wallace to nix other suitors and sign with Baltimore, the Ravens get another chance Thursday with Jeremy Maclin.

h1.a: Should Ravens turn focus to Eric Decker and away from Jeremy Maclin?

div.p: Eric Decker, suddenly perhaps available, is the red zone threat and model of consistency that Joe Flacco and the Ravens desperately need.

h1.a: Dennis Pitta will always hold a special place in Ravens history

div.p: After suffering his third hip injury last week, Dennis Pitta was released by the Ravens. The tight end will be remembered for his big plays and grit.

h1.a: Ravens can use Dennis Pitta's release to lure much-needed wide receiver

div.p: After cutting Dennis Pitta, the Ravens have another $2.5 million available in cap space to possibly acquire the likes of Jeremy Maclin or Eric Decker.

h1.a: Execs, coaches and evaluators grade Ravens' offseason

div.p: It's tough finding insiders excited about the Ravens' direction over the past few seasons. "It's like they expect [Joe] Flacco to regain his magic when he won the Super Bowl," a former GM said.

div.span: Releasing Pitta a business decision for Ravens (1:20)

div.p: Free agent WR Jeremy Maclin has completed his visit to the Bills, a source tells ESPN NFL Insider Adam Schefter, and is departing for his next visit with the Ravens.

ul.data-name: Free agent WR Jeremy Maclin has completed his visit to the Bills, a source tells ESPN NFL Insider Adam Schefter, and is departing for his next visit with the Ravens.

a.class: btn-social sm email icon-font-before icon-email-solid-before Shortstop

h1.a: Ravens release Pitta; Maclin set to make visit

div.p: Tight end Dennis Pitta, who suffered a dislocated hip during OTAs last week, was released by the Ravens, clearing $2.5 million in cap space.

h1.a: Ravens add TE Ryan Malleck, injury-waive CB Carlos Davis

div.p: In an attempt to add TE depth following Dennis Pitta's injury, the Ravens signed Ryan Malleck and waived Carlos Davis to make room on the roster.

Ravens will hold three open practices in training camp:
July 30: At M&T Bank Stadium, 6 pm
Aug. 5: At Navy-Marine Corps Stadium, 6 pm
Aug. 12: At M&T Bank Stadium, 10 am
All other practices will be closed to public because of on-going construction to renovate the Ravens facility.

ul.data-name:

a.class: btn-social sm email icon-font-before icon-email-solid-before Shortstop

h1.a: Biggest roster decisions: Ravens seeking explosive plays

div.p: Between pass-catchers and runners, the Ravens must find more consistent speed. One player who could provide that is a healthy Breshad Perriman.

Former Chiefs WR Jeremy Maclin is scheduled to visit Buffalo today, sources told ESPN NFL Insider Adam Schefter, with plans being made to visit Baltimore on Wednesday. The Eagles and Browns also have expressed some level of interest. Decision likely this week.

ul.data-name: Former Chiefs WR Jeremy Maclin is scheduled to visit Buffalo today, sources told ESPN NFL Insider Adam Schefter, with plans being made to visit Baltimore on Wednesday. The Eagles and Browns also have expressed some level of interest. Decision likely this week.

a.class: btn-social sm email icon-font-before icon-email-solid-before Shortstop

h1.a: Ravens hope to meet with Jeremy Maclin if he gets out of Buffalo

div.p: Jeremy Maclin seems like a good fit for a Baltimore offense in need of a veteran WR, but the Bills are making a push to sign the free agent.

h1.a: For Ravens' undrafted rookie Ricky Ortiz, it's making the NFL or making guacamole

div.p: Ricky Ortiz wants to become the Ravens' next fullback. If that doesn't happen, the undrafted rookie is ready to go all-in on avocados and guacamole.

Baltimore Ravens looking to meet with recently released Jeremy Maclin on Wednesday, according to ESPN's Adam Schefter. Ravens have a history of not letting sought-after feee agents leave Baltimore (ask Steve Smith Sr.). Joe Flacco currently only has one wide receiver on the roster who had more than 34 catches last season.

ul.data-name: Baltimore Ravens looking to meet with recently released Jeremy Maclin on Wednesday, according to ESPN's Adam Schefter. Ravens have a history of not letting sought-after feee agents leave Baltimore (ask Steve Smith Sr.). Joe Flacco currently only has one wide receiver on the roster who had more than 34 catches last season.

a.class: btn-social sm email icon-font-before icon-email-solid-before Shortstop

div.p: The Baltimore Ravens can get a few Steelers-related tips from new cornerbacks Brandon Boykin and Al-Hajj Shabazz. Both played for Pittsburgh in recent years, including Shabazz for most of last season.

ul.data-name: The Baltimore Ravens can get a few Steelers-related tips from new cornerbacks Brandon Boykin and Al-Hajj Shabazz. Both played for Pittsburgh in recent years, including Shabazz for most of last season.

a.class: btn-social sm email icon-font-before icon-email-solid-before Shortstop

h1.a: Niners sign LB Dumervil to bolster pass rush

div.p: The 49ers signed veteran pass-rusher Elvis Dumervil on Monday.

San Francisco Ravens? The signing of pass rusher Elvis Dumervil on Monday means the 49ers have added three players from last year's Ravens team this offseason. San Francisco previously signed fullback Kyle Juszczyk and traded for center Jeremy Zuttah.

ul.data-name: San Francisco Ravens? The signing of pass rusher Elvis Dumervil on Monday means the 49ers have added three players from last year's Ravens team this offseason. San Francisco previously signed fullback Kyle Juszczyk and traded for center Jeremy Zuttah.

a.class: btn-social sm email icon-font-before icon-email-solid-before Shortstop

div.p: Ravens free up $2.1 million in salary-cap room by parting ways with cornerback Kyle Arrington. Baltimore had under $5 million in cap space before these moves, which ranked among the lowest in the NFL.

ul.data-name: Ravens free up $2.1 million in salary-cap room by parting ways with cornerback Kyle Arrington. Baltimore had under $5 million in cap space before these moves, which ranked among the lowest in the NFL.

a.class: btn-social sm email icon-font-before icon-email-solid-before Shortstop

div.p: Ravens announce they've signed two cornerbacks -- Brandon Boykin and Al-Hajj Shabazz -- and released Kyle Arrington, who missed all of last season with a concussion

ul.data-name: Ravens announce they've signed two cornerbacks -- Brandon Boykin and Al-Hajj Shabazz -- and released Kyle Arrington, who missed all of last season with a concussion

a.class: btn-social sm email icon-font-before icon-email-solid-before Shortstop

h1.a: Ravens add CB Boykin, release CB Arrington

div.p: The Baltimore Ravens signed veteran cornerback Brandon Boykin and parted ways with cornerback Kyle Arrington on Monday.

Veteran cornerback Brandon Boykin, who was signed by the Ravens on Monday, has primarily been a nickel-back during his career. Baltimore lost its nickel-back on Thursday, when Tavon Young tore his ACL. Boykin has made eight interceptions in a career where he has played for the Eagles, Steelers, Panthers and Bears. He missed all of last season after tearing his pectoral muscle.

ul.data-name: Veteran cornerback Brandon Boykin, who was signed by the Ravens on Monday, has primarily been a nickel-back during his career. Baltimore lost its nickel-back on Thursday, when Tavon Young tore his ACL. Boykin has made eight interceptions in a career where he has played for the Eagles, Steelers, Panthers and Bears. He missed all of last season after tearing his pectoral muscle.

a.class: btn-social sm email icon-font-before icon-email-solid-before Shortstop

h1.a: Ravens, Bills, 49ers among best potential fits for Jeremy Maclin

div.p: There should be plenty of suitors for 29-year-old receiver Jeremy Maclin, who had 1,000-yard seasons in 2014 and 2015.

h1.a: Terrance West takes nothing for granted, especially starting RB role

div.p: Terrance West doesn't appear to have any competition for the starting running back job. So what's he worried about?

95 days until the NFL season:
The only active player with multiple receptions of at least 95 yards is Mike Wallace, who caught a 95-yard TD from Ben Roethlisberger in 2011 against the Cardinals and caught a 95-yard TD from Joe Flacco in 2016 against the Steelers.

ul.data-name:

The only active player with multiple receptions of at least 95 yards is Mike Wallace, who caught a 95-yard TD from Ben Roethlisberger in 2011 against the Cardinals and caught a 95-yard TD from Joe Flacco in 2016 against the Steelers.
